page.title: 07Recreation in Inverbervie
page.content: The{River Bervie}is a fine place for boys to fish in. The fishing season starts in April and ends in September. You have to have a licence which is free but if you lose it you have to pay Â£5. Popular kinds of fishing are worming, fly fishing, spinning and the bad people poach. The main fish caught are salmon, trout and rainbow trout. Another good sport is{BMX Cyling.} We have a BMX track in our D Block in Church Street. More than half the kids have BMX bikes. The track is about 83 metres long. There are two types of BMXing, Racing and Freestyle tricks. The main tricks are roll backs, ariels and kick turns.
